|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./harp-map-controls.mapcontrolsui.dispose.md) |  | Destroy this \[\[MapControlsUI\]\] instance. Unregisters all event handlers used. This method should be called when you stop using \[\[MapControlsUI\]\]. |
